references.paper_title: Scanrefer: 3d object localization in rgb-d scans using natural language
references.reason: This paper introduces the ScanRefer dataset, a benchmark dataset crucial for evaluating 3D visual grounding methods, which is extensively used in this paper for experimental evaluation.

references.paper_title: Referit3d: Neural listeners for fine-grained 3d object identification in real-world scenes
references.reason: This paper introduces the ReferIt3D dataset, another important benchmark dataset for 3D visual grounding, providing a diverse set of descriptions for objects in 3D scenes.

references.paper_title: Empirical evaluation of gated recurrent neural networks on sequence modeling
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational understanding of recurrent neural networks, which are commonly used in natural language processing components for multimodal tasks like 3D visual grounding.

references.paper_title: 4d spatio-temporal convnets: Minkowski convolutional neural networks
references.reason: This work introduces Minkowski Convolutional Neural Networks, a crucial architectural component for efficient 3D data processing, that underlies the architecture proposed in this paper.

references.paper_title: Bert: Pre-training of deep bidirectional transformers for language understanding
references.reason: This paper introduces BERT, a widely used pre-trained language model that is crucial for text encoding in multimodal tasks, and its application is discussed in this paper.
